headings.text: How to Buy a Protection Plan
Didn't find what you were looking for?

paragraphs: The Walmart Protection Plans by Allstate are available for some products sold on Walmart.com.

You can select a protection plan on the item page or at checkout for eligible items. Protection plans for online orders must be purchased during checkout. If you would like a protection plan after you checkout, you can buy a protection plan in store within 30 days of your online order with your receipt.
Coverage starts on the date of purchase and not after the manufacturer's warranty expires.
To learn more, seeWalmart Protection Plans by Allstate. Here you can find Frequently Asked Questions,Terms and Conditions, and more.
Use these steps to track a claim you’ve already submitted:

The Manufacturer warranty covers when the item itself is defective.
The protection plan covers:DefectsAccidentsDamage to the itemReplacements or repairs at no additional cost where applicable
Replacements or repairs at no additional cost where applicable
Replacements or repairs at no additional cost where applicable
The Standard Plan is for products such as TVs, home appliances, lawn & garden, power tools, etc.
The Standard Plan covers:Mechanical and electrical failuresPower surges or power supply failureBreakdowns during normal use
Power surges or power supply failure
Power surges or power supply failure
The Accident Plan is for select portable electronics such as laptops, tablets, phones, and headphones.
The Accident Plan covers:Drops and cracked screensSpills and liquid damageEverything covered in Standard Plans
Go toWalmart Protection Plans by Allstate.
Login or set up your account.
Follow the prompts to file a claim.
Go toWalmart Protection Plans by Allstate﻿.
Follow the prompts to track a claim.

help_sections.title: How to Buy a Protection Plan
content: You can select a protection plan on the item page or at checkout for eligible items. Protection plans for online orders must be purchased during checkout. If you would like a protection plan after you checkout, you can buy a protection plan in store within 30 days of your online order with your receipt.

help_sections.title: How Protection Plans Work
content: Coverage starts on the date of purchase and not after the manufacturer's warranty expires.
The Manufacturer warranty covers when the item itself is defective.The protection plan covers:DefectsAccidentsDamage to the itemReplacements or repairs at no additional cost where applicable
To learn more, seeWalmart Protection Plans by Allstate. Here you can find Frequently Asked Questions,Terms and Conditions, and more.

help_sections.title: Types of Plans
content: The Standard Plan is for products such as TVs, home appliances, lawn & garden, power tools, etc.The Standard Plan covers:Mechanical and electrical failuresPower surges or power supply failureBreakdowns during normal use

The Accident Plan is for select portable electronics such as laptops, tablets, phones, and headphones.The Accident Plan covers:Drops and cracked screensSpills and liquid damageEverything covered in Standard Plans

help_sections.title: File a New Claim
content: Go toWalmart Protection Plans by Allstate.SelectFile a claim.Login or set up your account.Follow the prompts to file a claim.

help_sections.title: To Track an Existing Claim
content: Use these steps to track a claim you’ve already submitted:
Go toWalmart Protection Plans by Allstate﻿.SelectFile a claim.Login to your account.Follow the prompts to track a claim.
